    • Method Detail

      • setNetworkName

        public EsxPlacementConfig.Builder setNetworkName(java.lang.String networkName)
        The network of the ESX host to which the new appliance should connect. Omit this parameter if the ESX host has one network. If null and there is only one network configured, it will be used.
        Parameters:
        networkName - New value for the property.

      • setResourcePoolPath

        public EsxPlacementConfig.Builder setResourcePoolPath(java.lang.String resourcePoolPath)
        The path to the resource pool on the ESX host in which the appliance will be deployed. Not applicable when not in resource pool
        Parameters:
        resourcePoolPath - New value for the property.

        public EsxPlacementConfig build()
